LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.AttachmentMode.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: How would you like to select products?

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.CategoryId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The attachment category. All attachments in a given category will be grouped together if the category grouping is enabled from the Settings of the plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.DisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The display order of the attachment. It is used when ordering the attachments on the public website.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.DownloadId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The download file for the attachment. To upload a file, you need to have write permissions to directory: "/Content/Files/Attachments".

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.FieldValidationMessages.DownloadId
LocaleResource.Value: You need to specify a file to download or video embed code for the attachment.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.ImageId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The image which is displayed beside the attachment link on the public website.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.IsShared.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked this attachment will be shared between multiple products based on a condition.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.LanguageId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The language for which this attachment will be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name of the attachment, which will be shown as a title for the attachment link on the public website.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.ProductsMappingTabTitle.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the Attachment before you can add product mappings.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.ShortDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The short description could be used primarily for administration purposes to remind the store owners of the purpose of the attachment. This description could also be shown on the public website with the attachment link itself.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.StoresTabTitle.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the Attachment before you can limit it to stores.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.VideoEmbedCode.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The video embed code for the attachment. It is used to play the video. If a video embed code is specified the download file for the attachment will be ignored.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.Visible.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the attachment is visible in the public website.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.Attachment.WidgetsTabTitle.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the Attachment before you can add it to the widget zones.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.AttachmentCategory.DisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The display order of the attachment category.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.AttachmentCategory.FieldValidationMessages.Name
LocaleResource.Value: The attachment category name is required.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.AttachmentCategory.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name of the attachment category.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.AttachmentCategory.StoresTabTitle.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the Attachment Category before you can limit it to stores.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.AttachmentWidget.AddAttachment
LocaleResource.Value: Add the attachment to the new widget zone.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.AttachmentWidget.Description
LocaleResource.Value: You can add the attachment to as many widget zones as you would like. Just create a new widget by selecting the desired widget zone and click the 'Add new' button.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.FileExtensionImage.BackToList
LocaleResource.Value: Back to File Extension Image list

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.FileExtensionImage.FieldValidationMessages.FileExtensions
LocaleResource.Value: The file extensions for the image is required.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.FileExtensionImage.FieldValidationMessages.ImageId
LocaleResource.Value: The image for the file extensions image is required.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.FileExtensionImage.FieldValidationMessages.Name
LocaleResource.Value: The name for the file extensions image is required.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.FileExtensionImage.FileExtensions.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The file extensions to which this image is mapped. The extensions should not contain a leading dot and need to be separated by a semicolon. For example: pdf;doc;xls.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.FileExtensionImage.ImageId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The image which will be shown for the specified file extensions.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.FileExtensionImage.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name for this image, which is shown only in the nopCommerce administration.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.FileExtensionImage.StoresTabTitle.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the File Extension Image before you can limit it to stores.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Entities.ProductAttachment.DisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The display order of the attachment

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.NopProductsTabTitle.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the product before you can add attachments.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.AddFilesInOrderCompleteEmails
LocaleResource.Value: Add attachment links in Order Complete Emails

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.AddFilesInOrderCompleteEmails.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether attachment files are linked in the order complete emails for the products. You need to use the %Order.Attachments% token in your OrderCompleted.CustomerNotification message template.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.AddFilesInOrderPlaceEmails
LocaleResource.Value: Add attachment links in Order Placed Emails

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.AddFilesInOrderPlaceEmails.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether attachment files are linked with the order placed emails for the products. You need to use the %Order.Attachments% token in your OrderPlaced.CustomerNotificationS message template.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.DefaultWidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The widget zone on the product details page, where the attachments will appear.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.Enable.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enables the Nop Attachments plugin. This setting can be overridden per store.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.GroupAttachmentsByCategory.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the attachments should be grouped by their category.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.OpenLinksInNewWindow
LocaleResource.Value: Open links in a new window

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.OpenLinksInNewWindow.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether the attachment links will be open in a new window.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.ProductAttachmentsPanelTitle.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The title for the panel where the attachments will appear on the product details page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.StoreFilesInDatabase.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: A value indicating whether files are stored in the database or the file system.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Settings.StoreFilesInDatabase.Note
LocaleResource.Value: NOTE: Do not forget to backup your database before changing this option

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.NopAttachments.Admin.Submenus.ManageDefaultImagesForFileAttachments
LocaleResource.Value: Manage Default Images for File Attachments

LocaleResource.Name: Enums.SevenSpikes.Nop.Plugins.Attachments.Domain.AttachmentMode.Automatic
LocaleResource.Value: Automatically select products based on conditions
